summary: A collection of batch files which will allow a player to quickly spawn items from various categories, as well as a couple extra files for leveling up and tweaking stats.
descriptionHtml:
[center]Today, I've made a large collection of batch files for base Skyrim without DLC for those times when I do not want to go farm for items. Rather than just lumping every item into one file, I've separated them into multiple themed files. Even though I only added base game items, these files should work with DLC. DLC only items just won't be added. I've limited most items to ten per console use so that inventories are not completely weighed down.

For those of you who do not know what a batch file is, it is a simple text document containing multiple console commands, with one on each line. By running the bat command in Skyrim's console, you can execute multiple commands at once.


[color=#ffff00]A brief overview of the files (You can view the files once you've downloaded them with a text editor to see exactly what is given):[/color]

[color=#00ffff]AllAlchemyIngredients-[/color] This file gives you ten of every alchemy ingredient each time run it.

[color=#00ffff]AllAnimalParts-[/color] This file gives you ten of every hide, pelt, leather, chitin, dragon bone/scale and troll skull.

[color=#00ffff]AllAtronachForgeItems-[/color] This file gives you ten charcoal, brooms, centurion cores,empty wine bottles, rolls of paper and ruined books.

[color=#00ffff]AllDivineAmulets-[/color] Give one of each Amulet of (Divine Name).

[color=#00ffff]AllEnchantments-[/color] Gives you a bunch of enchanted items that can be used at an enchanting table to disenchant so that you learn it.

[color=#00ffff]AllGems-[/color] Gives ten of each common and flawless gem.

[color=#00ffff]AllIngots-[/color] Gives ten of each ingot crafted at a smelter.

[color=#00ffff]AllSmeltingIngredients-[/color] Gives ten of each ore as well as ten of each Dwemer metal type.

[color=#00ffff]AllSoulGemsEmpty-[/color] Gives ten empty soul gems of each tier, including Black, plus one each of Azura's Star and The Black Star.

[color=#00ffff]AllSoulGemsFull-[/color] Gives ten full soul gems of each tier, including Black.

[color=#00ffff]AllSpellTomes-[/color] This gives one of every spell tome that can be acquired in game.

[color=#00ffff]AllTools-[/color] Gives one thousand septims, ten lockpicks, ten torches, one pickaxe and one woodcutter's axe.

[color=#ff0000]ActualLevelUp-[/color] This file repeats the level up of every skill 81 times. It does not add perks or health/magicka/stamina. After running it, you'll have to manually apply points. I did it this way to avoid issues and bugs in regards to improper leveling.

[color=#ff0000]AmazingStats-[/color] This is a very small and simple file that uses the player.forceav command to permanently set health, magicka, stamina and carry capacity to a high number. 1000 for Health, Magicka and Stamina. 100,000 for Carry Capacity. These can be changed to your preference easily.


[color=#ffff00]-Installation-[/color]
Download InventoryBatch.rar
Unzip with WinZip, SevenZip, WinRar or whichever unzipping utility you use.
Place all or your choice of ,txt files into Skyrim's base installation directory, NOT the Data folder.
For 64 bit users, it should look something like Program Files (x86)\Steam\steamapps\common\skyrim.
Once in game, open the console with the tilde key (~) if you're using an American keyboard. I don't know what key it is for foreign keyboards.
Depending on which file you want to use, type the following- "bat filename"Â  without the quotation marks.
Press Enter then press the tilde key again to close the console.

Check out my other mods:[/center][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/38216/?][center]Thieves Guild Rebuilder[/center][/url]
author: FallUpFallInFallOut
